desc: Bayview Farm Kona Coffee on the Big Island of Hawaii. Bayview Farm Estate, Kona’s premier coffee plantation and processing facility, now offers direct bookings for guided tours and coffee tasting, daily from 10am to 3:30pm. Visit our modern Visitor Center and enjoy the spectacular scenery. Call today 808-238-5839.

layout.text:
Bay View Farm in Kona, Hawaii
Planting, Harvesting, Processing, Roasting, Tasting
Since 1984
808.238-5839
